headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SHERRIN, MARC S

snippet: SHERRIN--Marc S. Age 68, beloved son of Anita and Sidney Sherrin, passed away May 27th. Survived by his brother Jeffrey, his sister Carol and Larry Weissenberg, his beloved nieces, nephews, friends, associates, and most of all, his companion, Junco S. Pollach. He has all our love and best wishes for peace and serenity. May he rest in peace. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHERRIN--Marc S. Age 68, beloved son of Anita and Sidney Sherrin, passed away May 27th. He has all our love and best wishes for peace and serenity. May he rest in peace. 1/3
